text: Sodium fluoride is a chemical compound. It is made of sodium and fluoride ions. Its chemical formula is NaF. It tastes bitter and is toxic. It is made by reacting hydrofluoric acid with sodium hydroxide. It is used in toothpaste to prevent tooth decay. It is a white crystalline solid. ==Related pages== *Sodium chloride *Sodium bromide *Sodium iodide Category:Sodium compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Sodium fluoride
